content:
Customize Auto-Responses in Service Cloud Messaging Channels

Available in: Lightning Experience. View required editions

USER PERMISSIONS NEEDED
To set up and edit Messaging channels: Configure Messaging
To view channels: View Setup and Configuration

From Setup in Lightning Experience, enter Messaging in the Quick Find box, and then select Messaging Settings.
Find your channel in the list. Click the down arrow on the right-hand side and select Edit.

In the Automated Responses section, enter the messages that you want to send to customers.
Save your changes.

FIELD DESCRIPTION EXAMPLE REQUIRED?
Conversation Acknowledgment 
Opt-In Keywords START, OPT IN Short codes only
Opt-In Confirmation Thanks for opting in and allowing us to send you messages. SMS and short codes only
Opt-Out Keywords STOP Yes
Opt-Out Confirmation You’ve opted out of receiving messages from us, so we won’t contact you again. Yes
Double Opt-In Prompt To confirm your subscription to [Campaign Name] [Description] Alerts, reply YES. Short codes only
Double Opt-In Keywords CONFIRM, YES, Y Short codes only
Help Keywords HELP, AIDE Short codes only
Help Response [Campaign Name] [Description] Alerts: Help at [source of help] or [toll free number]. Msg&data rates may apply. Short codes only
Custom Keywords INFO Short codes only
Custom Response [Campaign Name] [Description] Alerts: Contact us at [web URL] or [email address]. Msg&data rates may apply. Short codes only

Consent Type Implicit Opt-In—(Default) Explicit Opt-In—

TIP In addition to customizing auto-responses, save agents time during messaging sessions by giving them predefined “quick text” messages.

SEE ALSO Customize the Messaging Opt-In and Opt-Out Experience Create and Send Auto-Response Components in Messaging Sessions Standardize Responses with Quick Text
title: Customizing Auto-Responses in Service Cloud
